recipesJson.name: TOC'S Strawberry Shortcake
recipesJson.author: VapingCrimson
recipesJson.description: This is hands down the only Strawberry vape I've loved. Substitutions for this could include Sugar Cookie (cap) 2% Sweet Cream for Cream Fresh by Flavorah at 1% If you don't have Nonna's cake substitute 6% Sugar cookie (cap) and drop the above sugar cookie in substitute for Cookie (FA) The Marshmallow could be subbed with any other marshmallow as well.
